direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve processing byte arrays and setting attribute values.
Both methods handle data conversion and involve similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods set the attribute's body, making them interchangeable in certain test contexts.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require setting up the attribute's body before comparison.
Encoding the attribute may be required before or after the comparison to ensure consistency.
Both methods handle byte array comparisons and can be used to verify the equality of attribute values.
